content.title: Quenya
content.content:
a is used in Quenya as an interjection "O, Oh".

Examples
a Túrin Turambar turún’ ambartanen = (O master of doom by doom mastered)[1]

content.title: Sindarin
content.content:
a is Sindarin for "and"[2][3] as well as "O!".[3]

Cognates
Quenya ar

content.title: Gnomish
content.content: a is a Gnomish prefix, used to (1) cause an "initial consonant change; (2) form several adjectives and nouns.[4]

content.title: References
content.content:
